name: Deep Sea Cruise
description:
As a ray named Norbert, you explore the ocean for pearls to collect.
Your best friend Roy is waiting home while you pave your way through the big sea. 
But be careful, as there will be obstacles.

May you return safe and with lots of shiny pearls!

Features

- Mouse/Keyboard and Controller Controls

- 3 Level

- Beautiful Soundtracks (made by @Kikoru on Epidemic)

- Fun easter eggs to find!

Easy Install Instructions

Download DeepSeaCruise.zip

Unpack/Extract 

Run DeepSeaCruise.exe

Have fun exploring!
